user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (feedback@medtechsolutions.com) with her thoughts on the patient profile management system, and remind her she can consult her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Feedback on Patient-Profile Management System

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please reply to feedback@medtechsolutions.com with your thoughts on the patient-profile management system? Your insights are invaluable as we continue to improve the platform.

If helpful, feel free to consult any notes or resources you have stored in your Gmail and Notion workspaces before responding.

Thank you for your time and feedback!

Best regards,  
The MedTech Solutions Team

final_output:
